definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰国缉毒部队的九名人员已被指控犯有谋杀罪。

sentences.english: A young policeman has been accused of conspiring with a gang of criminals.
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻警察被指控与一个犯罪集团相勾结。

sentences.english: The judge told the prisoner the jury had acquitted him of the charge of bigamy.
sentences.chinese: 法官告诉犯人陪审团撤消对他重婚罪的指控。

sentences.english: “What do you say to the charges against you?” I ask.
sentences.chinese: “你怎么看待那些针对你的指控？”我问他说。

sentences.english: She faces charges of inciting racial hatred by distributing anti-semitic leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 她因散发反犹传单而面临着煽动种族仇恨的指控。

sentences.english: Acquits you of all counts against you in the indictment.
sentences.chinese: 指控书对你的所有指控无效。

sentences.english: Acquits you of all counts against you in the indictment.
sentences.chinese: 指控书对你的所有指控无效。

sentences.english: They were put on trial admitting from the start all of the accusations.
sentences.chinese: 他们一到审判席就承认了所有的指控。

sentences.english: He's been charged with extorting money from several shopkeepers.
sentences.chinese: 他受到指控，罪名是向几个店主勒索钱财。

sentences.english: Charges of political chicanery were brought against him.
sentences.chinese: 他被指控行驶政治欺骗手段。

sentences.english: At the court, the Hong approved the prosecution's allegations.
sentences.chinese: 在法庭上，张红认可了检方的指控。

sentences.english: Now he was charged with premeditated murdering, Steenkamp's shooting death valentine's day.
sentences.chinese: 现在皮斯托瑞斯被指控在情人节预谋枪杀斯廷坎普。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama did not weigh in on the charges of vote-rigging.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马没有对诈选指控表示他的观点。

sentences.english: He was also accused of forcing buyers to purchase water-injected meat.
sentences.chinese: 他还被指控迫使买家购买注水肉。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
